title: Quick Wear Launcher
summary: ☆Quickly launch your favorite apps from your wear with this new Wear Launcher!
description: ► You have to own an Android Wear device in order to use this app!► Compatible with all Android Wear devices including support for round and rectangle displays;► This app will replace your default Wear Launcher►New Wear GUI - includes homescreen, shortcut icons (by double clicking the lateral icons of menu icon), status bar, free-to-use watchfaces for a whole new user experience;►7 Themes - includes custom watchface,wallpaper and launcher color;►16 Wallpapers - choose your favorite wallpaper for your homescreen by double clicking on homescreen;►Brightness control - control your wear brightness from status bar;►Battery status control - check your wearable energy;►Sound profiles - toggle between different wear sound profiles with the help of Sound control icon present in the statusbar;►Lockscreen manual lock -  lock wear device in order to see watchface from launcher custom statusbar;►Vibration based on actions - makes smartwatch vibrate for specific actions;First time startTo make it work when you first install it, please:* Open the app on your smartphone while the watch is connected;* Read installation guide from this companion app;* Click once and release the Power hardware button of your smartwatch;* Select Quick Wear Launcher as your default launcher;
descriptionHTML:
► You have to own an Android Wear device in order to use this app!
► Compatible with all Android Wear devices including support for round and rectangle displays;
► This app will replace your default Wear Launcher


►New Wear GUI - includes homescreen, shortcut icons (by double clicking the lateral icons of menu icon), status bar, free-to-use watchfaces for a whole new user experience;
►7 Themes - includes custom watchface,wallpaper and launcher color;
►16 Wallpapers - choose your favorite wallpaper for your homescreen by double clicking on homescreen;
►Brightness control - control your wear brightness from status bar;
►Battery status control - check your wearable energy;
►Sound profiles - toggle between different wear sound profiles with the help of Sound control icon present in the statusbar;
►Lockscreen manual lock - lock wear device in order to see watchface from launcher custom statusbar;
►Vibration based on actions - makes smartwatch vibrate for specific actions;

First time start

To make it work when you first install it, please:
* Open the app on your smartphone while the watch is connected;
* Read installation guide from this companion app;
* Click once and release the Power hardware button of your smartwatch;
* Select Quick Wear Launcher as your default launcher;
